alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 06 at 2:23AM PDT until May 07 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Owens Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds in the Owens Valley will likely be in the Big Pine area, the Independence area, and along Highway 395 south of Olancha.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley
